name: Leandro Maciel Almeida
content: Leandro M. Almeida - Home Page Leandro M. Almeida Home | Contact | Curriculum Vitae | Publications | Ph.D. Project | M.Phil. Project | B.Sc. Projects Professor, Centre of Informatics, Federal University of Pernambuco (Brazil) Ph.D. in Computer Science (2011) Centre of Informatics, Federal University of Pernambuco (Brazil). M.Phil. in Computer Science (2007), Centre of Informatics, Federal University of Pernambuco (Brazil). Bs.C. in Information Systems (2004), Lutheran University Centre of Palmas, Lutheran University of Brazil (Brazil). I am currently working with automatic problem decomposition for pattern recognition with supervised learning. My research interests are: Pattern Recognition Machine Learning Data Mining Artificial Neural Networks Automatic Problem DecompositionNeural Network Ensembles Evolutionary Algorithms (co-evolution, multi-objective techniques, hybridization with neural networks) Bio-Inspired Optimization Methods Last update on 16 January 2012.
